description.fr: Vaincre tous les Chuchoteurs. \--- {%FightStarted} {ARvalue:ar,+} aux Chuchoteurs. \--- ATTAQUE\_DES\_JOUEURS\_: Inflige à nouveau son {%AT} si la cible est en {#TENAILLE}.
description.en: Defeat all the Whisperers. \--- {%FightStarted} {ARvalue:ar,+} to the Whisperers. \--- PLAYERS'\_ATTACK: Inflicts {%AT} again if the target is in {#TENAILLE}.
description.es: Vencer a todos los susurradores. \--- {%FightStarted} {ARvalue:ar,+} a los susurradores. \--- ATAQUE DE LOS JUGADORES: Inflige de nuevo su {%AT} si el objetivo está en {#TENAILLE}.
description.de: Alle Flüsterer besiegen. \--- {%FightStarted} {ARvalue:ar,+} für alle Flüsterer. \--- GREIFT\_DER\_SPIELER\_AN: Verursacht erneut seinen {%AT} als Schaden, wenn des Ziel {#TENAILLE} ist.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Sussuradores. \--- {%FightStarted} {ARvalue:ar,+} a todos os Sussurradores. \--- ATAQUE\_DOS\_JOGADORES: Inflige novamente seu {%AT} se o alvo estiver em {#TENAILLE}.
